product_name: Marmot Tempo Soft-Shell Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Lightweight and multipurpose, the women's Marmot Tempo Soft-Shell Jacket breathes if you're hiking hard, sheds drizzle if you get caught out, and lets you listen to tunes as you go. Double-weave Marmot M3 soft shell is the most breathable soft shell made by Marmot; best for highly aerobic activities in drier, milder climates. Polyester/elastane fabric is stretchy, breathable and water-resistant. Zippered chest pocket has a headphone port. Elastic-bound cuffs and elastic drawcord hem seal in warmth. Marmot Tempo Soft-Shell Jacket for women has zippered hand pockets. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) allows full range of arm motion and prevents jacket from riding up when arms are raised. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and multipurpose, the women's Marmot Tempo Soft-Shell Jacket breathes if you're hiking hard, sheds drizzle if you get caught out, and lets you listen to tunes as you go.
